languages.text: {n}Я чувствую, что они скрываются в толпе. Мои враги. Они осторожны. Я должна найти их и дать им уверовать в свою удачу. Тогда они сбросят маски — и я заберу их.{/n}
{n}I feel them lurking in the crowd. My enemies. They are cautious. I must find them and let them believe their luck. Then, they will shed their masks, and I will take them down.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Я чувствую, что они скрываются в толпе. Мои враги. Они осторожны. Я должна найти их и дать им уверовать в свою удачу. Тогда они сбросят маски — и я заберу их.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ich spüre, wie sie in der Menge lauern. Meine Feinde. Sie sind vorsichtig. Ich muss sie finden und sie ihr Glück glauben lassen. Dann werden sie ihre Masken ablegen und ich werde sie ausschalten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I feel them lurking in the crowd. My enemies. They are cautious. I must find them and let them believe their luck. Then, they will shed their masks, and I will take them down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ich spüre, wie sie in der Menge lauern. Meine Feinde. Sie sind vorsichtig. Ich muss sie finden und sie ihr Glück glauben lassen. Dann werden sie ihre Masken ablegen und ich werde sie ausschalten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los percibo acechando entre la multitud. Mis enemigos. Son cautos. Debo encontrarlos y dejar que crean en su buena fortuna. Así, se quitarán sus máscaras y podré eliminarlos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I feel them lurking in the crowd. My enemies. They are cautious. I must find them and let them believe their luck. Then, they will shed their masks, and I will take them down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los percibo acechando entre la multitud. Mis enemigos. Son cautos. Debo encontrarlos y dejar que crean en su buena fortuna. Así, se quitarán sus máscaras y podré eliminarlos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}奴らが群衆の中に潜んでいるのが感じられる。私の敵だ。連中は用心深い。私は彼らを見つけて自分の運の良さを信じさせなければならない。そうすれば彼らは仮面を脱ぎ、私は彼らを討つ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I feel them lurking in the crowd. My enemies. They are cautious. I must find them and let them believe their luck. Then, they will shed their masks, and I will take them down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}奴らが群衆の中に潜んでいるのが感じられる。私の敵だ。連中は用心深い。私は彼らを見つけて自分の運の良さを信じさせなければならない。そうすれば彼らは仮面を脱ぎ、私は彼らを討つ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}我能感觉到那些人潜伏在人群之中。我的敌人非常谨慎，我必须找到他们，让他们以为好运站在他们这边。在那之后，他们便会摘下面具，而我也会摘下面具。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I feel them lurking in the crowd. My enemies. They are cautious. I must find them and let them believe their luck. Then, they will shed their masks, and I will take them down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}我能感觉到那些人潜伏在人群之中。我的敌人非常谨慎，我必须找到他们，让他们以为好运站在他们这边。在那之后，他们便会摘下面具，而我也会摘下面具。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Je sens qu'ils m'observent. Mes ennemis. Ils restent prudents. Je dois les trouver et les laisser croire en leur chance. Et lorsqu'enfin, ils abaisseront leurs masques, je frapperai.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I feel them lurking in the crowd. My enemies. They are cautious. I must find them and let them believe their luck. Then, they will shed their masks, and I will take them down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Je sens qu'ils m'observent. Mes ennemis. Ils restent prudents. Je dois les trouver et les laisser croire en leur chance. Et lorsqu'enfin, ils abaisseront leurs masques, je frapperai.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kalabalığın arasında düşmanlarımın pusuya yattığını seziyorum. Temkinliler. Onları bulup şanslarının yaver gittiğine inandırmalıyım. Ardından maskelerini çıkaracaklar. Ben de işlerini bitireceğim.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I feel them lurking in the crowd. My enemies. They are cautious. I must find them and let them believe their luck. Then, they will shed their masks, and I will take them down.{/n}
